        public Response chatEvent(ChatEvent e)

      • handleSelectedBot

        public Response handleSelectedBot(java.lang.String msg)
        Handles BotsSelected request. == Assigns in-game ids to bot wrappers (and bots).
        Parameters:
        msg - Body of the request.
        Returns:
        Returns response to that request. Empty message with OK status if everything goes according to plan.
